item.title: About
item.description: I am a Software Developer at Goldman Sachs, India since 2017. I got a chance to do my internship at Goldman Sachs, India which eventuated into a full time role. I received my Integrated Master Degree in Mathematics and Computer Science from IIT BHU. During final semester of my undergrad degree I interned with DIPAS Lab DRDO, New Delhi working on an interesting problem on computational neuroscience involving prediction of hypoxia in soldiers located in high altitude locations.

item.title: Rational Exuberance
item.description: Time Series Analysis 101 Work in Progress
